item.text: I, therefore, the prisoner for the Lord, urge you to live worthily of the calling with which you have been called,

<st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="5012" class="">humility</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4240" class="">gentleness</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3115" class="">patience</st>, <st data-num="430">putting up with</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="240">one another</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>,

<st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="3391" class="">one</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>, <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="908" class="">baptism</st>,
one God and Father of all, who is over all and through all and in all.
But to each one of us grace was given according to the measure of Christ’s gift.
Therefore it says, “When he ascended on high he captured captives; he gave gifts to men.”
Now what is the meaning of “he ascended,” except that he also descended to the lower regions, namely, the earth?

<st data-num="846" class="">He</st>, the very one<n id="1" /> who <st data-num="2597" class="">descended</st>, <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> the one who <st data-num="305" class="">ascended</st> <st data-num="5231" class="">above</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="3772" class="">heavens</st>, <st data-num="2443">in order to</st> <st data-num="4137" class="">fill</st> <st data-num="3956">all things</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> he <st data-num="846">himself</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="3588">some</st> as <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st>, <st data-num="3588">some</st> as <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st>, <st data-num="3588">some</st> as <st data-num="2099" class="">evangelists</st>, <st data-num="1161">and</st> <st data-num="3588">some</st> as <st data-num="4166" class="">pastors</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1320" class="">teachers</st>,<n id="2" />

<st data-num="4314">to</st> <st data-num="2677" class="">equip</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st> of <st data-num="1248" class="">ministry</st>, that is,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3619">build up</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,

<st data-num="3360" class="">until</st> we <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2658" class="">attain</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1775" class="">unity</st> of the <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> of the <st data-num="1922" class="">knowledge</st> of the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>—a <st data-num="5046" class="">mature</st> <st data-num="435" class="">person</st>, <st data-num="1519" class="">attaining to</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3358" class="">measure</st> of <st data-num="5547">Christ’s</st> <st data-num="4138" class="">full</st> <st data-num="2244" class="">stature</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2443" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> we <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3371" class="">no longer</st> to be <st data-num="3516" class="">children</st>, <st data-num="2831" class="">tossed back and forth by waves</st> and <st data-num="4064" class="">carried about</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="417" class="">wind</st> of <st data-num="1319" class="">teaching</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="2940" class="">trickery</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">people</st> who <st data-num="3834">craftily carry out</st> their <st data-num="4106" class="">deceitful</st> <st data-num="3180" class="">schemes</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="226">practicing the truth</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>,<n id="1" /> we will in <st data-num="3956">all things</st> <st data-num="837">grow up</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st>.
From him the whole body grows, fitted and held together through every supporting ligament. As each one does its part, the body builds itself up in love.
So I say this, and insist in the Lord, that you no longer live as the Gentiles do, in the futility of their thinking.

They are <st data-num="4656" class="">darkened</st> in their <st data-num="1271" class="">understanding</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">being</st> <st data-num="526" class="">alienated</st> from the <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because of</st> the <st data-num="52" class="">ignorance</st> that <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">due to</st> the <st data-num="4457" class="">hardness</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st>.

Because <st data-num="3748">they</st> are <st data-num="524" class="">callous</st>, they have <st data-num="3860" class="">given</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st> <st data-num="3860" class="">over</st> to <st data-num="766" class="">indecency</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="2039" class="">practice</st> of <st data-num="3959">every kind</st> of <st data-num="167" class="">impurity</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4124" class="">greediness</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3129" class="">learn</st> about <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="3779">like this</st>,

<st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="1065" class="">indeed</st> you <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> about <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> were <st data-num="1321" class="">taught</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2531">just as</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.

<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> were taught <st data-num="2596" class="">with reference to</st> your <st data-num="4387" class="">former</st> <st data-num="391" class="">way of life</st> to <st data-num="659" class="">lay aside</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3820" class="">old</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> who is being <st data-num="5351" class="">corrupted</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">in accordance with</st> <st data-num="539" class="">deceitful</st> <st data-num="1939" class="">desires</st>,
to be <st data-num="365" class="">renewed</st> in the <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3563" class="">mind</st>,
and to put on the new man who has been created in God’s image—in righteousness and holiness that comes from truth.
Therefore, having laid aside falsehood, each one of you speak the truth with his neighbor because we are members of one another.
Be angry and do not sin; do not let the sun go down on the cause of your anger.
Do <st data-num="3366" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> the <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st> an <st data-num="5117" class="">opportunity</st>.

The one who <st data-num="2813" class="">steals</st> must <st data-num="2813" class="">steal</st> <st data-num="3371">no longer</st>; <st data-num="3123 1161">instead</st> he must <st data-num="2872" class="">labor</st>, <st data-num="2038" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> with <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> he will <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> something to <st data-num="3330" class="">share</st> with the one who <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">need</st>.

You must let <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4550" class="">unwholesome</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> <st data-num="1607">come out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">only</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">what</st> is <st data-num="18" class="">beneficial</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="3619">building up</st> of the one in <st data-num="5532" class="">need</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> it would <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> to those who <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3076" class="">grieve</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> you were <st data-num="4972" class="">sealed</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> of <st data-num="629" class="">redemption</st>.

You must <st data-num="142">put away</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="4088" class="">bitterness</st>, <st data-num="2372" class="">anger</st>, <st data-num="3709" class="">wrath</st>, <st data-num="2906" class="">quarreling</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="988">slanderous talk</st>—indeed <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2549" class="">malice</st>.<n id="1" />
Instead, be kind to one another, compassionate, forgiving one another, just as God in Christ also forgave you.
